verbose_text: Since this study measured the lactulose induced increase of gas indirectly, with the hydrogen breath test, a more recent study of the FODMAP diet obtained a direct confirmation of the increasing intestinal gas by abdominal X-ray [XREF_BIBR]; these findings, thus, support the theory that the FODMAP diet increases the intraluminal volume of gas and fluid.
evidence: FODMAP diet increases the intraluminal volume of gas
